meanings.definition: The quality or state of being verifiable.
meanings.sent1: The verifiablenesses of the experiment were questioned by the scientists.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on the verifiablenesses of data to draw accurate conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The verifiablenesses of the detective's evidence made the criminal confess.
meanings.sent4: The verifiablenesses of the theory shone brightly in the face of skepticism.
meanings.sent5: The verifiablenesses of the witness's testimony left no room for doubt.

meanings.definition: The ability to be confirmed or proven to be true.
meanings.sent1: The verifiablenesses of the document were crucial in the court case.
meanings.sent2: Scientists strive to establish the verifiablenesses of their hypotheses.
meanings.sent3: The verifiablenesses of the magic trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The verifiablenesses of the rumor spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The verifiablenesses of the treasure map led to a great discovery.
